about_paragraph1: Hi, I'm Aditia, also known as fian. I am a Full-Stack Developer dedicated to designing scalable web systems with efficient API architectures. For me, there is no greater satisfaction than watching lines of code transform into responsive, real-world applications running smoothly in production.
about_paragraph2: I’m the type of developer who loves peeking 'under the hood.' From optimizing Linux servers and building my own CLI tools to currently expanding my horizons into Blockchain technology and modern Mobile Apps. I am always looking for ways to make development workflows faster and smarter—because I believe technology should simplify things, not complicate them.
about_paragraph3: Think of this blog as a living documentation of my technical journey. Here, you will find an archive of tutorials, experimental notes, and practical software engineering solutions. I write these down so that neither of us has to scratch our heads twice over the same problem. Happy reading, and I hope you find something valuable to take away!
Privacy Policy Content:
At Fian's Blog, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

**Information We Collect:**
- Personal information you provide when subscribing to our newsletter
- Usage data through cookies and analytics

**How We Use Your Information:**
- To send you updates about new blog posts
- To improve our website and content
- To communicate with you

**Data Sharing:**
We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties.

**Contact Us:**
If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at your.email@example.com.
